name: Frog (Adey)
description:
Help the frog in defending his world. Fun game with 5 challenging levels .

Instructions

Tap anywhere on the screen to move the frog to this point.

Tap and hold any ball to adjust its direction when shooting.

Try throwing as many bomb balls into the opponent world within a specific time.

The player who ends with the most bombing balls in his world is the loser.

This is the indicator for elapsed time and number of balls in your world:

This is a video to describe the game mechanism:

Download & install instructions

Run the game directly from your browser,
If the game does not work or if you like to try it on your mobile you can download the Android and Windows version from this address:

https://adey.itch.io/frog-for-android-and-desktop

Note that the Windows version and Android version are not included in  my Zanga entry. I could not build and upload them for lack of time
But I care about your opinion of the game so give it a try :)

Waiting your comments and I appreciate your suggestions.
